input.sentences: the soccer coach gave his big speech .
the cheerleaders then showed their pride .
the team sang the star spangled banner right before the game started .
they kicked the soccer ball around the field for a while .
the game ended in a 0-0 draw after 3 hours .
output.sentences: I am elated and proud to hear my Dad sing the national anthem!
I wish I had half as much energies as the peppy cheerleaders.
I pray I never forget to salute the flag.
I hooped and hollered lots, that game was so close!
I love how being a fan brings all kinds of people together.
